title: 行政大樓停車場、人社院周邊黑板樹修剪作業公告。Announcement of pruning work on the blackboard trees around the Administration Building parking lot and the Humanities and Social Sciences College.
author: 邱健榮
content:
分類： 行政公告
來源： 總務處環境保護組 - 邱健榮 - janus@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話6613
對象： 全校教職員_全校學生
標題： 行政大樓停車場、人社院周邊黑板樹修剪作業公告。Announcement of pruning work on the blackboard trees around the Administration Building parking lot and the Humanities and Social Sciences College.
日期： Thu, 6 Jul 2023 12:14:39 +0800

一、施作期間：112年7月7日(五)上午8時至下午5時。
二、施作地點:行政大樓停車場、人文社會科學學院一至三館周邊黑板樹。
三、為考量人車安全，作業期間如遇雨天順延施作，並依施作進度調整作業區域，不另行公告，請依現場交管人員指揮，車輛停至其他停車場，非施工人員禁止進入作業區域，車輛行駛間請避開作業區域，不便之處敬請見諒。
                                                                             總務處環保組 敬啟

1.Construction period: July 7th (Friday), 2023, from 8 am to 5 pm.
2.Construction site: Blackboard trees around the Administration Building parking lot and Humanities and Social Sciences Buildings 1 to 3.
3.In consideration of the safety of people and vehicles, if it rains during the construction period, the construction will be postponed and the construction area will be adjusted according to the progress of the construction without further notice. Please follow the instructions of the on-site traffic control personnel, park your vehicle in other parking lots, and non-construction personnel are prohibited from entering the construction area. Please avoid the construction area when driving, and please forgive any inconvenience caused.
                                         Environmental Protection Section, General Affairs Office
